Comments_List: I learned how to converse and write in Chinese and distinguish between terms that have similar meanings.

It goes so fast!!! Compared to L1-L3, L4 goes at about twice the speed and for harder lessons, too. Wish we could've done them at the same pace as in the past because then I'd actually learn more as opposed to just memorizing for the daily quizzes.
Yes! Despite the hard work, it was still worthwhile. Wouldn't do it again, but wouldn't have chosen not to take it-- if that makes sense.
Yes! If you want to get in touch with your heritage and make friends this is the class to go.
